message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm open to negotiation, $1,300,000 is below my target price. Could you consider $1,425,000? This reflects the true value of the product.
I understand the product has value, but $1,425,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,350,000. Can you consider this offer?
